          <title>
            <string language="sl">Pravila za deljivost</string>
            <string language="en">Divisibility rules</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Teilbarkeitrichtlinien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Règles de divisibilité</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Réguas do divisibility</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Regole di divisibilità</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Divisibility κανόνες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reglas de la divisibilidad</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">PowerPointova diaprojekcija s predstavitvijo pravil za deljivost.</string>
            <string language="en">Presentation of two basic divisibility rules (divisibility of multiplication and addition).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">deljivost</string>
            <string language="en">divisibility</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">število</string>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellung von zwei grundlegenden 
Teilbarkeitrichtlinien (Teilbarkeit der Vermehrung und der 
Hinzufügung).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentation de deux règles de base de 
divisibilité (divisibilité de multiplication et d'ajout).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentação de duas réguas básicas do 
divisibility (divisibility da multiplicação e da adição).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una presentazione di due regole di base di 
divisibilità (divisibilità di moltiplicazione e dell'aggiunta).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρουσίαση δύο βασικών divisibility κανόνων 
(divisibility του πολλαπλασιασμού και της προσθήκης).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentación de dos reglas básicas de la 
divisibilidad (divisibilidad de la multiplicación y de la adición).</string>
          </description>
